title: Change Malzahar's Malefic Vision to "Space Aids"

embed.description: Space Aids One of the three basic abilities of the character Malzahar, from the popular MOBA League of Legends. The actual name of the ability is Malefic Vision, but it is mostly referred to as "space aids" due to many of its unique characteristics.

body:
Space Aids

One of the three basic abilities of the character Malzahar, from the popular MOBA League of Legends. The actual name of the ability is Malefic Vision, but it is mostly referred to as "space aids" due to many of its unique characteristics. Some of the traits of Malefic vision is its status as a DOT (damage over time) its ability to be passed onto another target if its first target dies, and the general unpleasantness for those on the receiving end.

We the player base of League of legends would like to change the character Malzahar's ability Malefic Vision to "Space aids".
